projects.title: Self Driving Car
projects.description: This self-driving car project, implemented in C++ using the SFML graphic library, incorporates neural networks that learn through a Genetic Algorithm. The neural network logic is developed from scratch without relying on external libraries. The system includes a track editor based on BÃ©zier curves, allowing users to manipulate, add, and remove points, with a ability to add tracks
